title: GO SMS After the Rain Theme
creator: Gnokkia Themes

extendedInfo.description: GNOKKIA Themes for GO SMS Pro ThemeWARNING: Jelly Bean (Android 4.1) users MAY end up with a broken theme. This may be due to a new encryption from Google Play upon download. Waiting for a fix, if the theme is not showing up directly, please send an email for a non-encrypted copy using the Gmail account you purchased with.After the rain..... a coloured raimbow will light your life. Amazing theme full tested. Install it and test the difference: you will discover a new world of graphics.Fascinating icon set!HD elements from vectorial graphic art!Maximum readibility!Pendant addiction to the free After The Rain theme for GO Launcher EX!You MUST have GO SMS PRO installed! If not, it's available for free in Android Market.To apply the theme within GO SMS Pro : MENU >THEME >choose the theme and apply.Get a chance to install fine art on your phone!Thank you for your support, and don't forget to rate and leave a comment :)Follow us on Facebook http://facebook.com/GnokkiaMobileDesignFollow us on Twitter http://twitter.com/GnokkiaRead of us on www.gnokkia.netTry other art in themes searching for "Gnokkia" in Android MArket!Keywords:GO SMS Pro theme gosmstheme;

reviews.comment: I love this theme! It looks very clean on my HTC evo
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: NICE, just wish they were free, free, free
reviews.author: Betty L. Johnson Askew M. A
